1293880.name: Boo's Balloons
1293880.description:
I hope you're good at flying hot air balloons because Boo has lost all of their party balloons on the way to the fairground and it's the only form of transport they have got!

Search the skies in their hot air balloon and return them safely to the fairground landing pad. But watch out; try not to lose yourself in the clouds!
1293880.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
